original_text: For because he himself has suffered when tempted, he is able to help those who are being tempted.
korean_text: 그가 시험을 받아 고난을 당하셨은즉 시험 받는 자들을 능히 도우실 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: For because he himself has suffered when tempted,
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 친히 유혹을 받을 때 고난을 받았으므로,

sentences.original_text: he is able to help those
